LOC_EXPLANATION_ITEM: A blue location services icon will appear next to an item that uses location in the background, including geofences.
ALERT_TEXT: This will prevent all applications from using Location Services in the background, including geofences.
FOOTER_WLAN: Allow apps to refresh their content when on WLAN or cellular, or use Location Services, in the background. Turning off apps may help preserve battery life.
FOOTER_WIFI: Allow apps to refresh their content when on Wi-Fi or cellular, or use Location Services, in the background. Turning off apps may help preserve battery life.
